name: Quoitent And Division Quiz
description:
You love learn to mathematics? I'm  particularly  doing this, yes. Math very useful for your brain and  develops thinking.

We are made execellent test in the theme 9 class, namely is  private and divsible (qouitent and divison). But not simple private nd divisble from primary classes, where you are first meet with the division in the math. This is difficult  task from 9th class, where besides natural fractions, there degrees. You are have 3 attemps. In the game need a slove the 10 samples. Nothing hard in the test. Just in first divide the first numbers in the left line, later calculate negativity degress, which is at the top ten. Still this game a have results dedector and may rate results(In the current version this indicator not completed. I'm try fix in next version). In the game need is thinking to achieve results. Enjoy and progress!

Note: This education game available in the Russian language. Sorry! In the next time surely add other languages, including English. 

Bonus: In the files, exist version of the game Alpha 1! You may rate it!
